data.name: B.i.t.Lock Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This soundtrack includes 17 pieces of music composed by Peter Hofbauer that were used in the puzzle game B.i.t.Lock.
It has a slow tempo with both soothing and nerving elements to capture the tense but also relaxing feel of puzzle solving while not distracting too much from the main experience.

These 17 tracks include
- All main world themes
- Editor themes
- Additional tracks (title screen, credits, workshop, etc.)
